The Batman Figure

DC Multiverse Batman the Animated Series

Fans of DC Multiverse Batman the Animated Series will want to add this Batman Figure to their collection. When two shots rang out, Bruce Wayne’s life changed forever. He pledged himself to justice and he has upheld that oath for years. Wearing many names—the Dark Knight, the World’s Greatest Detective, the Caped Crusader—he has battled tragic foes like The Joker, The Penguin, Mr. Freeze, and so many more. But deep inside, he knows that he shares something with them that most of humanity wouldn’t understand—a commitment to the fight.

Price: £29.99

DC Multiverse Batman: Arkham Asylum

When his parents were gunned down in front of him, young Bruce Wayne resolved to rid Gotham City of the criminal element that took their lives. He trained extensively to achieve mental and physical perfection, in addition to mastering martial arts, detective techniques, and criminal psychology. Dressing as a bat to prey on criminals’ fears, Batman fights crime with the aid of specialized gadgets and vehicles, operating out of his secretive Batcave below Wayne Manor.

Price: £49.99

DC Multiverse Batman the Detective Comics

Fans of DC Multiverse Batman will want to add this Batman the Detective Comics Modern Figure to their collection. When two shots rang out, Bruce Wayne’s life changed forever. He pledged himself to justice and he has upheld that oath for years. Wearing many names—the Dark Knight, the World’s Greatest Detective, the Caped Crusader—he has battled tragic foes like The Joker, The Penguin, Mr. Freeze, and so many more. But deep inside, he knows that he shares something with them that most of humanity wouldn’t understand—a commitment to the fight.

Price: £84.99

Products Description

Material: PVC Appearance: Character Model Size: about 15 cm Function: collection, decoration, gift Matters needing attention: moisture, high temperature, regular cleaning.

Shipping & Delivery

Order by 5pm for standard shipping within 2-4 working days. Delivery is Monday to Friday, excluding public holidays. Any orders placed after 5pm Friday and over the weekend will not be dispatched until Monday, excluding Public Holidays. We will make every effort to deliver all your items together and at the same time, however in some cases your order may arrive in separate consignments.
